name: After School Program - Excelsior **Wait List**
description: To be added to the wait list only The After School program is currently full. You are adding to the wait list for the 2024-25 school year. If a spot opens up and we are able to offer you a spot, we will reach out. This afterschool program only pick up participants from Monroe. - Start times may vary based on the school release time. - The fee for the school year is $1,080. Parents will have the option to pay the entire fee upon registration. Payment plans are available. $270 is due upon registra
